entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
